channel.title: Need help with spawning ability
channel.description: Okay so basicly i want to make my server spawn server. Its Frozen-World base. Okay so.. i want some items like claws to be restricted to spawn to regularl players.

item.title: Need help with spawning ability
item.dc:creator: @HonorScape HonorScape
item.description:
@HonorScape wrote:

[code]if (PlayerCommand.equals(“item”)) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

 if(!isUnspawnable(newItemID)) {
      if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {
           addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
      } else {
           sM("No such item.");
      }
 } else {
      sM("You can't spawn this item.");
 }

} else {
sM(“Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100”);
}[/code]

Found this in this topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=451881.0

Read full topic
